snippet.title: Pizza Busters [SHARP X68000] 🍕
snippet.description:
This is Pizza Busters, The Final Task (ピザバスターズ) on the Sharp X68000. Shortest video game ever... your goal is to keep the Pizza delivery guy on the motorcycle from reaching his delivery point. There's nothing hard about this at all.. good looking game, fun quick play.


#PizzaBusters #SharpX68000 #X68000
